feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: CreateCRMEvent task - Handle cancelled status by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19272
  • feat: Use new /routing URL for routing forms by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19235
  • fix: remove section on /bookings if no data exists by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19261
  • feat: v2 slots new version by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18758
  • refactor: remove depreceated fields by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19279
  • chore: Refactor to remove getServerSideProps for /teams route by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19286

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.11...v4.9.12

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.9.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Salesforce - if no contact throw Error by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19271
  • fix: missing await router controller by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19276
  • fix: Default people filter in bookings list for admin by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18035
  • feat: add CSAT to V2 bookings return by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19278
  • chore: disable v2 booking seats safe parse error logs by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19292
  • revert: Reapply "fix: Multiple rr-hosts combine to create erroneous availabilâ€¦ by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19263

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.12...v4.9.13

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: calendars controller v2 docs by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19291
  • feat: v3 of UI components by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19136
  • fix: add ireland to noAlphanumericSenderIdSupport by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19117
  • perf: separate client vs server code from insights layout by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19285
  • feat: Use Folders to organize SMS links on Dub by @steven-tey in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19248
  • fix: removing-all-members-toggle-for-fh by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19277

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.9.13...v5.0.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: global e2e fail by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19306
  • chore: migrate /apps/routing-forms/[...pages] to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18956
  • chore: migrate api for team upgrade to App Router by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19100
  • fix: cut off and alignment bug by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19317
  • fix: nested scrolls on /bookings by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19284
  • fix: Can't change availability for managed event type by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19006
  • fix: bulk-update-in-scheduleId-in-detailed-view by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19295
  • feat: prevent automatic query parameters when opening booking page by @sanchitttt in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18132
  • feat: atoms adjustments with ui v3 styles by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19320
  • refactor: Clean out old code, no longer needed by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19323

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.0...v5.0.1

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Create UserCreationService and use in API V1 create user endpoint by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19150
  • fix: HubSpot doesn't work for paid team events. by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19298
  • fix: timezone input text is now visible in dark mode by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19325
  • feat: make first tab active by default by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19315
  • perf: Use one PageWrapper instance for all settings pages by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18752
  • fix: Can't use unsaved booking question as variable in event name by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18604
  • chore: remove WithLayout from not-found route by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19331
  • fix: redirect logic in /settings/admin/apps route by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19332
  • chore: v3 fixed filters, new profile view by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19312
  • fix: Issues with date changes in column view by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19258
  • chore: fixed tooltip position for routing form by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19267
  • fix: Fairness when routing by @emrysal & @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18550
  • fix: blank add guest input, location and request reschedule glitch by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19335

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.0.1...v5.0.2
